thread.title: Coolest office spaces: Weber Shandwick, New Honor Society share ‘fashionable’ space downtown
thread.title_full: Coolest office spaces: Weber Shandwick, New Honor Society share ‘fashionable’ space downtown

author: Vince Brennan
title: Coolest office spaces: Weber Shandwick, New Honor Society share ‘fashionable’ space downtown
text: 13 photos Weber Shandwick and New Honor Society share the space at 555 Washington Ave. Both history and fashion come together at the 31,000-square-foot space shared by public relations firm Weber Shandwick and creative agency New Honor Society at 555 Washington Ave. The building, located in the former fashion district, was designed by Francis Lee with Thomas Annan in 1875 and once housed the May Department Store. 13 photos Weber Shandwick and New Honor Society share the space at 555 Washington Ave. With a fashionable history ingrained in the structure, New Honor Society moved into the space in 1999 with Weber Shandwick following in 2003. Both agencies have made aesthetic changes and updates that enhance the original “industrial complex” look and feel, said Weber Shandwick Senior Vice President Laura Garner . “Repurposed industrial artifacts create a steampunk-inspired edge that, when merged with whimsical murals and other playful accents, bears an uncanny resemblance to nearby City Museum,” Garner said. “The space evolves with its inhabitants: a 15-foot monster mouth appears beneath the nickname-engraved bar top, and a polar-bear-fur wall looms over the content studio, showcasing a rotation of employees’ creative works.” In addition, the office features more practical amenities, such as a communal lunch table and a fully-stocked bar. “This industrial-creative space — where ‘art’ meets ‘work’ — makes employees, their dogs and their clients, feel right at home,” said Garner, who did not disclose design or construction costs. Click on the slideshow to take a peek inside the historic downtown building. If you think your office belongs in the Business Journal ’s “ Coolest Office Spaces ” feature, send me a quick description (including cost, square footage and any unique features) along with 10 photos to vbrennan@bizjournals.com.
